messages.title: The real choice in this election
messages.content: The real choice in this election is between an experienced, local candidate with a proven track record or another Tory sent to follow the party line. I ask you to place your trust in me again on Thursday 12 December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut crime and fund the NHS properly.
Invest in schools and give our children a better future. We can reduce prisoner poverty and make work pay.

issues.economy: Too often local people have insecure jobs on low pay and struggle to make ends meet. The gap between the North East and London is getting wider.
issues.environment: Working with householders in Shiremoor to protect their homes from flooding.
issues.health: Crime is going up and NHS waiting times are growing longer.
issues.socialWelfare: Working with pensioners in New York who were missing out on Pension Credit.

housing.content: Working with residents in Tynemouth to tackle alcohol-related anti-social behaviour.
Working with residents in Whitley Bay and Monkseaton to regenerate our seaside town.
Working with Cullecoats residents to save our Urgent Care Centre.

leaflet.personalStatement: It doesn't have to be like this. A Labour Government can and will make a difference.

politicalExperience.achievements: Having been local MP with a proven track record.

contactInformation.address: 99 Howard Street, North Shields, Tyne and Wear NE30 1NA

images.caption: Alan Campbell - the experienced, local choice

leaflet.additionalNotes: People tell me it’s important to have an experienced, local MP, someone who lives in and understands our community.
